title: Supercharge your Dev workflow
text: The v11 release of the balena CLI comes jam packed with exciting new features to supercharge your balena workflow. Checkout our blog post here to see how livepush changes the game.

title: The secret secrets feature
text: One of the little known secrets of the CLI is that it includes the ability to push projects with secret keys and variables that are only mounted during build. This allows one to use secret info at build time which never makes it down to your devices. You can read more about this feature in our documentation.
